column1: <![CDATA[The content of element type 'ce:author' is incomplete, it must match '(ce:given-name?,ce:surname,(ce:suffix)?,(ce:degrees)?,(ce:roles)?,(ce:e-address)*)']]>
An element with the identifier 'fig1' must appear in the document.
Attribute value 'sec-1' of type ID must be unique within the document.
The content of elements must consist of well-formed character data or markup.
The entity 'nbsp2' was referenced, but not declared.
Attribute 'id' must be declared for element type 'ce:figure'.
The element type 'ce:section' must be terminated by the matching end-tag '</ce:section>'.
Value 'invalid-date' is not facet-valid with respect to pattern for type 'dateType'.
